activities: We receive data to do custom programming and other data work on a job by job basis. All data received from the UK is returned to the UK for final processing.
privacyprograms: We are SOC1 and SOC2 certified, PCI certified, HIPAA compliant
recoursemech: All complaints should first be brought to our organization for resolution and if we are unable to satisfactorily address the complaint, the complaint should then be escalated to BBB EU Safe Harbor. If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint, or if your complaint is not satisfactorily addressed by Streamworks, please visit the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR web site at www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints for more information and to file a complaint.
